Bash(# Announcement modülü
mkdir -p /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Announcement/resources/views/themes
if [ -d "/mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Announcement/resources/views/front/themes/blank" ]; then
    mv /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Announcement/resources/views/front/themes/blank /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Announcement/resources/views/themes/
    rm -rf /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Announcement/resources/views/front/themes
fi

# Portfolio modülü
mkdir -p /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Portfolio/resources/views/themes
if [ -d "/mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Portfolio/resources/views/front/themes/blank" ]; then
    mv /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Portfolio/resources/views/front/themes/blank /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Portfolio/resources/views/themes/
    rm -rf /mnt/c/laragon/www/laravel/Modules/Portfolio/resources/views/front/themes
fi

echo "Dizin yapısı düzeltildi")
